review: This seems like it would have been a good product, but j could not use it with my iPhone so I could not evaluate it
author: Ferria Decembre

review: The wifi range sucks. My other devices work much better.
author: Roberto Gomez Jr.

review: I was disappointed in the number of offerings that had to be paid for.  I am able to watch things on my iPad that would cost money to view using my fire stick.  Why am I am Amazon Prime member if I have to pay for so many things?  And I'm not talking about new items, but some older offerings
author: Jeanette N. Ellian

review: I like this product a lot, but I was dissapointed to learn that I couldn't cast my screen in the same way you can when you own a chromecast. I ended up buying a chromecast soon after this purchase just to get that feature as it's extremely convenient. It's really the only reason I wanted a stick. This one is great for hotels, however, so Ill be bringing it with me on vacations!
author: Trevor "Trevor"

review: The one App (Plex) I really use did not give me the experiance I get on a Roku.
author: Demosesneeds Punchard

review: Easy to plug in and get it going.  The tutorial was excellent.  I watched a couple of Amazon Prime movies the first night and the streaming picture and sound was great.  It certainly adds a lot more to my Amazon Prime subscription and I know we are only scratching the surface.  The only downside was I now have another remote control to contend with.  It's small and easy to lose.
author: Tommy Waldrop

review: ROKU is a much better product.
author: Michael Anderson

review: Doesn't work!! It will not stream anything all it does is say check Internet. We tried everything and still could not get it to work.
author: Brittany Whipple
